aboutDescription: Hi, Welcome to my page. I am a Full Stack Developer. I am currently in Zomentum. My curiosity for coding is endless.

projects.name: Kalpayita: A Machine Learning Approach to Interior Designing
projects.description: A voice driven tool to convert the voice or text to a relevant 3D scene.

projects.name: Sign Language Gesture Recognition
projects.description: A PC application for recognizing the hand gestures through a live video.

projects.name: Easy Cash
projects.description: Application to make online UPI payment simple by making an interactive payment system, and facilitating addition of multiple UPI accounts.

projects.name: Smart Trauma Reliever (STAR) App
projects.description: Android Application that uses NLP and Machine Learning approaches to find crime violation types and report them.

projects.name: Safety App
projects.description: An app for emergencies. Shaking of phone will send danger message along with your location to selected contacts.
